title: An Unearthly Child
description: Two schoolteachers investigate the personal life of one of their brilliant students and her mysterious grandfather.

title: The Cave of Skulls
description: The TARDIS takes its new passengers back to the dawn of history. There, the Doctor and his party are captured by a tribe who are trying to rediscover the secret of fire.

title: The Forest of Fear
description: Old Mother frees the Doctor and the others on condition they will leave the tribe and not make fire.The group attempt to return to the TARDIS but Za and Hur follow them.

title: The Firemaker
description: Kal accuses Za of Old Mother's murder but the Doctor exposes him as the real killer.However, Za then insists the travellers be held prisoner until they show him how to make fire.

title: The Dead Planet
description: The TARDIS lands in a petrified forest on an alien planet. Determined to explore, the Doctor leads his companions into the metal city, where they discover the danger of what will become his deadliest enemies, the mutant Daleks. (Originally broadcast in seven parts.)

title: The Survivors
description: The Doctor, Susan and Ian search the city for Barbara and learn that the area is contaminated with radiation.Then they encounter the Daleks.

title: The Escape
description: Susan meets Alydon of the Thals and agrees to try and arrange a treaty between his people and the Daleks. But the Daleks only see it as an opportunity to wipe the Thals out.

title: The Ambush
description: The Doctor and his friends attempt to escape from the Dalek City. However, knowing that the Thals are walking into a trap, Ian decides to go and warn them.

title: The Expedition
description: The Doctor and his friends realise that their only chance of recovering the fluid link is to persuade the Thals to fight back against the Daleks.

title: The Ordeal
description: While Ian, Barbara and their Thal friends try to find a way into the Dalek City through the mountains, the Doctor, Susan and Alydon attempt to make their own way in.

title: The Rescue
description: Ian, Barbara and the surviving members of their party try to find a way into the Dalek City whilst Alydon prepares the other Thals for an attack. But only the Doctor and Susan are aware of the full extent of the threat the Daleks pose.

title: The Edge of Destruction
description: In this completely TARDIS-based story, the crew find themselves and their ship acting very strangely indeed. Blame runs high for the Ship's unusual behavior, until the Doctor realizes the TARDIS itself may be trying to warn them... (Originally broadcast in two parts; also known in fan circles as "Inside the Spaceship.")

title: The Brink of Disaster
description: The Doctor becomes increasingly suspicious of Ian and Barbara but when the occurrences aboard the TARDIS become even stranger he realises they are in even greater danger than they realised.

title: The Roof of the World
description: The TARDIS arrives on Earth in the 13th century, where it is claimed by famed explorer Marco Polo as a gift for his employer, Kublai Khan. Polo hopes to finally buy his way out of the Khan's service - but if he succeeds, the Doctor and his friends will never be able to get back to their Ship ever again... (Originally broadcast in seven parts.)

title: The Singing Sands
description: Tegana sabotages the party's water bags, leaving them in dire need of fresh supplies.

title: Five Hundred Eyes
description: The Doctor and Susan are able to supply Marco with condensation that has formed inside the TARDIS, saving the group from dying of first.When the group are reunited with Tegana, the travelers begin to suspect he is up to something.

title: The Wall of Lies
description: The Doctor's group manage to rescue Barbara from the Mongols but once more Marco remains unaware of Tegana's involvement.

title: Rider from Shang-Tu
description: The Doctor and his friends elect to warn Marco of Acomat's attack even though it means losing their chance to gain access to the TARDIS.

title: Mighty Kublai Khan
description: The Doctor, Ian and Barbara are forced to surrender to Tegana and Marco, leaving both of them the opportunity to gain possession of the TARDIS.

title: Assassin at Peking
description: Tegana finally makes his move to assassinate the Khan, giving the Doctor and his friends an opportunity to thwart his plans and regain the TARDIS.

title: The Sea of Death
description: On the planet Marinus, the Doctor and his companions are enlisted by Arbitan to seek out the keys to an ancient and powerful machine. Their quest takes them across time and space; will they be able to return the keys before Marinus falls under the control of the alien Voord? (Originally broadcast in six parts.)

title: The Velvet Web
description: The Doctor and his friends arrive in the apparently idyllic city of Morphoton but Barbara soon begins to realise there is more to their hosts than meets the eye.

title: The Screaming Jungle
description: The search for the second key takes the travellers to a jungle where Ian and Barbara come under threat from rapidly growing plants.

title: The Snows of Terror
description: Searching for the third key, Ian and Barbara meet with the sinister trapper Vasor before following Susan and the others into a cave system guarded by the mysterious Ice Soldiers.

title: Sentence of Death
description: The group are reunited with the Doctor in the city of Millennius where Ian faces trial for murder after the fourth key is stolen.

title: The Keys of Marinus
description: The Doctor and his friends must locate the real murderers and the fourth key before heading off for a final confrontation with the Voord.

title: The Temple of Evil
description: The TARDIS arrives on Earth landing in 16th century Aztec society. Barbara goes off exploring - despite the Doctor's orders not to wander off - and is taken away by the high priest Autloc who believes she is the reincarnation of the goddess Yetaxa. They believe it is a sign that the rains - which are late - will now come. The high priest of sacrifice Tlotoxl recruits Ian to lead their army but he finds he has a rival in Ixta. Ian is less than comfortable with his role when he learns that they are to deliver the human sacrifice to the high priest at the rain ceremony. The Doctor emphasizes that they must not interfere with Aztec rituals, something that does not sit well with Barbara.

title: The Warriors of Death
description: Barbara tries to change the course of history - and Ian fights for his life.

title: The Bride of Sacrifice
description: While the Doctor tries to find a way back to the TARDIS, Tlotoxl continues to plot Barbara's downfall and sees an opening when Susan questions Aztec custom.

title: The Day of Darkness
description: Tlotoxl's machinations result in both Susan and Ian being arrested.With the TARDIS once again trapped inside the tomb, the travelers' only hope for escape lies with Autloc and Cameca.

title: Strangers in Space
description: The TARDIS arrives aboard a spaceship that has been captured by the Sensorites, a hearing-sensitive alien race. The Sensorites are dying, and the Doctor finds himself forced to investigate the origin of the mysterious illness. (Originally broadcast in six parts.)

title: The Unwilling Warriors
description: The ship has been boarded by the Sensorites and the race is on to retrieve Susan and Barbara before they can find them.

title: Hidden Danger
description: The Doctor, Susan and Ian agree to accompany the Sensorites to their home planet in the hope of finding a cure for John. But not everyone is willing to welcome them there.

title: A Race Against Death
description: With Ian having fallen victim to the Sensorites' plague, the Doctor is desperate to find a cure. But the City Administrator is still determined to rid his world of aliens.

title: Kidnap
description: The City Administrator is determined to destroy the Doctor and his friends and his paranoia prevents the Doctor's cure from being distributed.

title: A Desperate Venture
description: While the City Administrator's schemes reach their climax, the Doctor and Ian venture into the tunnels under the city to discover the real cause of the Sensorite plague.

title: A Land of Fear
description: The TARDIS lands during the French Revolution, where Ian, Barbara, and Susan become caught up in the politics of the day. When they are arrested and set to be executed, the Doctor must take on the disguise of a public official to try and save their lives. (Originally broadcast in six parts.)

title: Guests of Madame Guillotine
description: Susan, Ian and Barbara are sentenced to be guillotined but an encounter with a dying English prisoner may offer Ian a chance of survival.

title: A Change of Identity
description: Susan and Barbara are rescued by Jules and Jean, two members of the escape chain, while the Doctor gains access to the prison by posing as a revolution official.

title: The Tyrant of France
description: The Doctor is forced into a meeting with Robespierre while Barbara's attempts to find a physician for Susan result in them being betrayed.

title: A Bargain of Necessity
description: Ian finds himself held prisoner by the treacherous Leon while the Doctor attempts to engineer Susan and Barbara's escape.

title: Prisoners of Conciergerie
description: Ian finally delivers his message to James Stirling but in order to secure Susan's release he and Barbara are forced into a dangerous spying mission.

title: Planet of Giants
description: When the TARDIS malfunctions and the doors open in the time vortex, the travelers and their Ship shrink to the size of insects. When they arrive on Earth, they uncover a murderous plot involving a new insecticide - but how can they stop the crime in their miniaturized condition? (Originally broadcast in three parts.)

title: Dangerous Journey
description: Ian and Barbara are accidentally taken into Smithers' laboratory and, while the Doctor and Susan face a hazardous journey to reach them, they witness the deadly effects of DN6 first hand.

title: Crisis
description: The Doctor and his friends face a race against time to expose Forrester's plans and return to normal size before Barbara succumbs to the effects of DN6.

title: World's End
description: Ian and Barbara believe the TARDIS has finally returned to their contemporary London, but soon discover signs of plague and warfare. Their old enemies, the Daleks, have invaded the Earth of the 22nd century. Separated and fighting for their lives, the travelers must try to aid the remaining humans and overthrow the Daleks' cruel tyranny. (Originally broadcast in six parts.)

title: The Daleks
description: The Doctor and Ian are taken to the Dalek saucer while Susan and Barbara join the rebels in planning an attack.

title: Day of Reckoning
description: The Doctor manages to escape from the Dalek saucer and meet up with Susan and David but Ian is left trapped onboard. Meanwhile, Barbara and her new friends face a dangerous journey across London.

title: The End of Tomorrow
description: While Susan and David try to find a way out of London, Ian and Larry infiltrate the Dalek mine workings.

title: The Waking Ally
description: The Doctor's party investigate the Daleks' central control in Bedfordshire while Barbara and Jenny's attempt to reach it are derailed when they are betrayed.

title: Flashpoint
description: The Daleks' plan to transform Earth into a giant spaceship and wipe out its inhabitants is nearing completion and the Doctor and his friends face a race against time to prevent them from destroying the planet's core.

title: The Powerful Enemy
description: On the planet Dido, the monstrous Koquillion terrorizes Bennett and Vicki, the only survivors of a crashed spaceship. When the TARDIS lands, the Doctor, Ian, and Barbara team up with Vicki to discover what Koquillion is hiding. (Originally broadcast in two parts.)

title: Desperate Measures
description: The Doctor and Ian reach the crashed spaceship and meet up with Barbara and Vicki, where the Doctor uncovers the truth about Koquillion.

title: The Slave Traders
description: The travelers decide to take a holiday near ancient Rome, but after a month the Doctor gets restless. He and Vicki determine to visit Rome, and while they are gone Ian and Barbara are abducted by slave traders. All roads lead to Rome, however, and the travelers find themselves at the mercy of the country's petulant emperor, Nero... (Originally broadcast in four parts.)

title: All Roads Lead to Rome
description: While the Doctor and Vicki meet with Nero, Barbara is taken to Rome to be sold while Ian is forced to work as a galley slave.

title: Conspiracy
description: Ian and Delos are forced to fight each other for their freedom while the Doctor has to perform for Nero's court.

title: Inferno
description: Ian and Delos manage to escape from Sevcheria and Tavius agrees to help Barbara rejoin them.The Doctor's attempts to avoid being thrown to the lions inadvertently result in Nero deciding to burn down Rome.

title: The Web Planet
description: The TARDIS is drawn by a mysterious force and lands on the alien planet Vortis. There the Doctor, Ian, Barbara and Vicki find themselves caught up in a war between an evil force known as "The Animus", its ant-like Zarbi allies, and the butterfly-like Menoptra race and their allies the subterranean Optera.

title: The Zarbi
description: The Doctor, Ian and Vicki are captured by the Zarbi while Barbara meets up with the butterfly-like Menoptera who are trying to reclaim the planet.

title: Escape to Danger
description: The Doctor is forced to co-operate with the Animus but Ian uses the opportunity to make an escape attempt.

title: Crater of Needles
description: Ian and Vrestin are captured by the subterranean Optera while Barbara and her Menoptera allies attempt to escape from the slave camp.

title: Invasion
description: Barbara and the surviving Menoptera take refuge in the Temple of Light while the Doctor and Vicki attempt to escape by taking control of a Zarbi.

title: The Centre
description: The Doctor and Vicki are taken before the Animus but the isoptope is left behind in the laboratory.The only hope of victory lies with Barbara and her Menoptera allies.

title: The Lion
description: The TARDIS lands in the Holy Land during the Third Crusade and the crew help save Richard the Lionheart from an ambush, but Barbara is captured and brought before Saladin.

title: The Knight of Jaffa
description: While the Doctor, Ian, and Vicki are drawn into the intrigues of King Richard's court, Barbara has to cope with an impatient Saladin and the vengeful El Akir.

title: The Wheel of Fortune
description: Barbara allies herself with a man whose were murdered by El Akir as the Doctor and Vicki are caught up in Richard's plan to offer his sister's hand in marriage to Saladin's brother.

title: The Warlords
description: Ian sets out with a reluctant accomplice to rescue Barbara from El Akir's palace as the Doctor and Vicki try to evade the suspicions of the Earl of Leicester.

title: The Space Museum
description: The TARDIS arrives on a planet that has been turned into a space museum but the Doctor and his friends are puzzled when they find themselves out of phase with their surroundings.

title: The Dimensions of Time
description: Now back on their proper time track, the Doctor and his friends must work to avoid the future they saw for themselves.

title: The Search
description: With the Doctor missing, Ian, Barbara and Vicki find themselves in danger from the Moroks while the Xerons also try to make contact with them.

title: The Final Phase
description: While Ian tries to force Lobos to release the Doctor from the museum, Vicki joins the Xerons in trying to gain the weapons needed to start a revolution against the occupiers.

title: The Executioners
description: The Daleks pursue The Doctor through time and space, with the intentions of exterminating him. Places they land include the Mary Celeste, a haunted house and the empire state building.

title: The Death of Time
description: While Ian and Vicki are threatened by a Mire Beast, the Doctor and Barbara meet up with the Aridians...who are then ordered to hand them over to the Daleks.

title: Flight Through Eternity
description: The TARDIS crew's attempts to escape from the Daleks take them to the top of the Empire State Building and a 19th century sailing ship.

title: Journey Into Terror
description: The TARDIS lands in a haunted house where the Doctor and his friends are confronted by Dracula and Frankenstein's Monster...and then the Daleks appear.

title: The Death of Doctor Who
description: With Vicki trapped on board the Dalek time machine, the Doctor, Ian and Barbara decide to make their stand on the planet Mechanus.

title: The Planet of Decision
description: The Doctor and his friends are taken into the Mechanoid City but their troubles are far from over...especially when the Daleks launch an attack.

title: The Watcher
description: The Doctor, Vicki, and Steven Taylor, go to 1066 England, but something doesn't seem right including modern inventions like a Gramaphone and electricity. Could there be another Time Lord?

title: The Meddling Monk
description: The Doctor is being held prisoner by the Monk and Steven and Vicki's search for him brings them to the Saxon village.But a greater danger threatens when a Viking raiding party arrives.

title: A Battle of Wits
description: The Doctor manages to escape from his cell and get the upper hand on the Monk but his plans are derailed when Sven and Ulf arrive at the monastery.

title: Checkmate
description: The Doctor finally discovers what the Monk is up to and must move fast to prevent his opponent from altering the course of history.

title: Four Hundred Dawns
description: After an encounter with a hostile robot called a Chumblie, the Doctor and his companions are rescued by a group of female Drahvins.

title: Trap of Steel
description: With the knowledge that the planet will be destroyed in two days, the Drahvins instruct the Doctor to help them steal the Rills' ship.

title: Air Lock
description: The Doctor and Vicki encounter the Rills and learn the situation is more complex than they thought while Steven finds the Drahvins' hospitality ever more perilous.

title: The Exploding Planet
description: The Doctor and Vicki enlist the aid of the Chumblies to rescue Steven from the Drahvins and then find a way off the planet before its destruction.

title: Mission to the Unknown
description: Whilst The Doctor, Steven and Vicki are traveling to their next destination. On the planet Kembel, Marc Cory, a Space Security Service agent discovers The Daleks are attending a secret meeting with their allies. Where Cory discovers the Dalek's evil plan, which sets the stage for the epic 14-part adventure "The Dalek Master Plan".

title: Temple of Secrets
description: The TARDIS lands in the middle of the Trojan War, where the Doctor is mistaken for the god Zeus.

title: Small Prophet, Quick Return
description: While Odysseus forces the Doctor to find a way to win the war, Steven decides to get himself taken prisoner in order to enter Troy and find Vicki and the TARDIS.

title: Death of a Spy
description: With Steven and Vicki being held prisoner by the Trojans, the Doctor's only hope of seeing them again is to suggest the idea of the Trojan Horse.

title: Horse of Destruction
description: The Doctor waits inside the Trojan Horse for a chance to reach his companions but Steven's assumed identity as a Greek soldier and Vicki's growing feelings for Troilus endanger their escape.

title: The Nightmare Begins
description: The Doctor runs afoul of the Daleks and Special Security Agent Bret Vyon on the planet Kembel.

title: Day of Armageddon
description: The Doctor infiltrates the Daleks' conference to try and discover their plans, leaving Steven, Katarina and Bret to find a way off the planet.

title: Devil's Planet
description: The Doctor and his friends escape Kembel in the Spar ship but the Daleks force them down on the planet Desperus, where they are threatened by a group of convicts.

title: The Traitors
description: With Katarina being held hostage, the Doctor, Steven and Bret are in danger of having to given in to Kirksen's demands, while, on Earth, Chen has them listed as traitors.

title: Counter Plot
description: The Doctor, Steven and Sara are accidentally transported to the planet Mira where Chen sends the Daleks after them.

title: Coronas of the Sun
description: The Doctor, Steven and Sara escape Mira in a Dalek pursuit ship but when they find the ship is returning to Kembel, they are forced to come up with a new plan to avoid the Daleks.

title: The Feast of Steven
description: The Doctor, Steven and Sara visit a Liverpool police station on Christmas Day and a Hollywood film set during the 1920s.

title: Volcano
description: The Daleks realise the Doctor has given them a fake Taranium Core while, on the planet Tigus, the Doctor encounters the Meddling Monk.

title: Golden Death
description: The Doctor, Steven and Sara travel to Ancient Egypt, pursued by both the Daleks and the Meddling Monk.

title: Escape Switch
description: Steven, Sara and the Monk are captured by the Daleks in order to force the Doctor to hand over the Taranium Core.

title: The Abandoned Planet
description: The Doctor, Steven and Sara reach Kembel where they find the Daleks have betrayed their allies and imprisoned them.

title: Destruction of Time
description: With the Daleks poised to invade the solar system, the Doctor decides his only option is to activate the Time Destructor prematurely, threatening the entire planet.

title: War of God
description: The TARDIS lands in sixteenth century Paris and Steven becomes involved with a group of Huguenots.

roles.char: Gaston de Levis, Viscount de Leran

title: The Sea Beggar
description: While trying to find the Doctor, Steven discovers a conspiracy to assassinate a man known as the Sea Beggar.

roles.char: Gaston de Levis, Viscount de Leran

title: Priest of Death
description: Steven has discovered the identity of the Sea Beggar, but can he warn the Huguenots in time?

roles.char: Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain
Parisian in Rue des Fosses St. Germain

title: Bell of Doom
description: Steven rejoins the Doctor and they leave Paris just ahead of the massacre, leaving Anne behind.

roles.char: Gaston de Levis, Viscount de Leran

title: The Steel Sky
description: The Doctor, Steven and Dodo arrive on a giant spaceship millions of years in the future, transporting the last humans away from the doomed Earth.

title: The Plague
description: With the Ark infected with a cold virus, the Doctor must convince the Guardians to trust him so he can find a cure.

title: The Return
description: The Doctor, Steven and Dodo have traveled 700 years into the future and find that the Ark is now under the control of the Monoids as it approaches Refusis.

title: The Bomb
description: The Monoids abandon the Ark, leaving Steven and the Guardians to die, but a mutiny in their ranks may give the Doctor a chance to bring about peace.

title: The Celestial Toyroom
description: The Doctor, Steven and Dodo arrive in the realms of the Celestial Toymaker, who forces them to play his deadly games.

title: The Hall of Dolls
description: While the Doctor continues to play the Trilogic Game with the Toymaker, Steven and Dodo are involved in a deadly game of musical chairs.

title: The Dancing Floor
description: Steven and Dodo are forced to cross the dancing floor, where the Toymaker's dolls plan to force them to dance for eternity.

title: The Final Test
description: As the Doctor nears the end of his game against the Toymaker, Steven and Dodo take on Cyril in a lethal game of hopscotch to try and recover the TARDIS.

title: A Holiday for the Doctor
description: The TARDIS arrives in Tombstone, Arizona in 1891. Where the Doctor is looking for a dentist when he has a toothache, where The Doctor finds the local dentist is the famous Doc Holliday who is in a feud with The Clanton Brothers and their hired gunfighter Johnny Ringo, whilst local sheriff Wyatt Earp is trying to keep the peace. The Doctor, Steven and Dodo find themselves joining forces with The Clanton Brothers and Sheriff Wyatt Earp.

title: Don't Shoot the Pianist
description: With the Clantons believing the Doctor to be Doc Holliday, Wyatt Earp takes him into protective custody but this leaves Steven and Dodo in danger.

title: Johnny Ringo
description: Earp comes to Steven's rescue and arrests Phineas Clanton, prompting the Clantons to decide to enlist the help of Johnny Ringo.

title: The O.K. Corral
description: The Clantons have shot Warren Earp, leading to a showdown between the two families with the Doctor powerless to prevent bloodshed.

title: The Savages: Episode 1
description: The Doctor, Steven and Dodo arrive in the far future and are welcomed by the advanced civilisation of the Elders but soon begin to suspect they are hiding a secret.

title: The Savages: Episode 2
description: The Doctor, Steven and Dodo investigate why there are Savages in the Elders' city and uncover the true price of the Elders' perfect society.

title: The Savages: Episode 3
description: The Doctor has been subjected to the Elders' extraction process and Steven and Dodo must return to their city to rescue him.

title: The Savages: Episode 4
description: The Doctor urges the Savages to finally bring an end to the Elders' oppression and enlists the help of an unlikely ally.

title: The War Machines: Episode 1
description: The Doctor and Dodo return to London in the present day where the Doctor becomes concerned about WOTAN, a new super-computer installed in the Post Officer Tower.

title: The War Machines: Episode 2
description: Dodo is under the control of WOTAN and attempts to lure the Doctor into a trap, while the rest of WOTAN's slaves begin construction on its robotic War Machines.

title: The War Machines: Episode 3
description: Ben tries to escape from the warehouse but is captured by Polly, who is now also under WOTAN's control, and forced to work on construction the War Machine.

title: The War Machines: Episode 4
description: The first War Machine is defeated but the Doctor only has a matter of hours to destroy WOTAN before the rest of its army is activated.

title: The Smugglers: Episode 1
description: The Doctor discovers Polly and Ben aboard the TARDIS shortly before the ship arrives in 17th century Cornwall, where the local churchwarden gives the Doctor a cryptic message shortly before being murdered.

title: The Smugglers: Episode 2
description: Pike is convinced that the Doctor knows the location of Avery's treasure while Polly and Ben try to convince the locals they were not responsible for Longfoot's murder.

title: The Smugglers: Episode 3
description: Polly and Ben are placed in the custody of Blake, who reveals he also has his suspicions about the Squire, while the Doctor and Kewper are forced to team up to escape from Pike's ship.

title: The Smugglers: Episode 4
description: The Doctor and his friends are at the mercy of Cherub, who is now seeking Avery's treasure for himself, while Pike prepares to attack the village.

title: The Tenth Planet: Episode 1
description: In 1986 a new planet appears in the Solar System which turns out to be a long-lost twin of Earth's named Mondas. Its inhabitants are the Cybermen.

title: The Tenth Planet: Episode 2
description: The Doctor's warnings are ignored and the Cybermen take over the base, hampering the crew's efforts to help Zeus IV.

title: The Tenth Planet: Episode 3
description: With the Doctor out of action, it is up to Polly, Ben and Barclay to stop Cutler using the Z-Bomb and devastating half the world.

title: The Tenth Planet: Episode 4
description: The Cybermen take over the base again, apparently to stop the humans using the Z-Bomb, but then the Doctor realises they intend to use it themselves to destroy Earth.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS arrives on the Earth colony of Vulcan where the newly-regenerated Doctor assumes the identity of an Earth Examiner.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 2
description: While the Doctor worries about the inert Daleks in the capsules, Lesterson makes plan to reactivate one of them.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 3
description: The Doctor fails to convince the colonists of the danger posed by the Daleks and soon the other two are also reactivated.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 4
description: With Polly being held prisoner by the rebels, the Doctor and Ben decide to investigate them, while Lesterson discovers the Daleks are reproducing.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 5
description: The Doctor and Quinn attempt to escape in order to stop Bragen using the Daleks to take over the colony.

title: The Power of the Daleks: Episode 6
description: With Bragen having taken over, the Daleks trick the rebels into turning them loose and only the Doctor can stop them wiping out the entire colony.

title: The Highlanders: Episode 1
description: The Doctor, Polly and Ben arrive in 1746, in the aftermath of the Battle of Culloden, and are captured by a group of Highlanders shortly before they themselves are captured by redcoats.

title: The Highlanders: Episode 2
description: Polly and Kirsty capture Lieutenant Ffinch to try and enlist his help while the Doctor tricks Gray in order to escape.

title: The Highlanders: Episode 3
description: With the Highlanders imprisoned aboard Trask's ship, the Doctor attempts to expose Grey's plan.

title: The Highlanders: Episode 4
description: Ben manages to join up with the Doctor, Polly and Kirsty and together they work to free the Highlanders from Trask's ship before Grey sells them into slavery.

title: The Underwater Menace: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS materialises on a deserted beach where the Doctor and his friends are captured by primitive warriors and taken to the fabled city of Atlantis.

title: The Underwater Menace: Episode 2
description: While Ara tries to save Polly from being turned into a Fish Person and Ben and Jamie try to escape from the mines, the Doctor discovers the full extent of Zaroff's plans.

title: The Underwater Menace: Episode 3
description: The Doctor and Ramo are sentenced to be sacrificed to the goddess Amdo and must escape to put a stop to Zaroff's plan.

title: The Underwater Menace: Episode 4
description: With Zaroff's plan nearing completion, the Doctor and Ben realise the only way to save the world is to destroy Atlantis.

title: The Moonbase: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS arrives on the Moon in the year 2070.When Jamie is injured, the other travellers are forced to seek the help of a moonbase afflicted with a space plague.

title: The Moonbase: Episode 2
description: The Doctor and his friends attempt to convince the Moonbase crew that the Cybermen are responsible for the disappearances and find a cure for the plague.

title: The Moonbase: Episode 3
description: The Cybermen take over the Moonbase and begin using the Gravitron to attack Earth but Polly, Ben and Jamie come up with a way to fight back.

title: The Moonbase: Episode 4
description: With the Cybermen preparing to launch a full attack, the Doctor and his friends must keep the Moonbase and the Gravitron out of their hands until help arrives from Earth.

title: The Macra Terror: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS arrives at a holiday camp company with the crew worried by a prediction of giant crabs and the Doctor becomes interested in the apparent madman Medok's stories of creatures that roam the colony at night.

title: The Macra Terror: Episode 2
description: The Doctor is unable to convince the colonists that the Macra exist and an attempt to brainwash his companions results in Ben betraying his friends.

title: The Macra Terror: Episode 3
description: The Doctor, Polly and Jamie are sentenced to work in the pits and an escape attempt sees Ben's loyalties called into question again.

title: The Macra Terror: Episode 4
description: The Doctor and Polly manage to save Jamie from the Macra and then try to show the Pilot who is really in charge of the colony.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS materialises on the runway of Gatwick Airport, where Polly witnesses a murder only to be kidnapped before she can report it.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 2
description: With Polly having apparently forgotten them, the Doctor, Ben and Jamie decide to carry out their own investigation of Chameleon Tours.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 3
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Sam manage to convince Crossland to trust them and he persuades the Commandant to let them continue their investigation.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 4
description: When Spencer attempts to kill them, the Doctor, Jamie and Sam become convinced Chameleon Tours are hiding something and Sam decides to book a ticket on one of their flights.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 5
description: Jamie finds himself aboard the Chameleons' satellite and meets their Director while the Doctor forces the Chameleon Meadows to tell him the aliens' plans.

title: The Faceless Ones: Episode 6
description: The Doctor and Pinto are captured by the Chameleons but the Doctor manages to use their dependence on their human originals to create dissent in their ranks.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 1
description: Trying to find the stolen TARDIS, the Second Doctor and Jamie are lured into a trap by the Doctor's old enemies the Daleks.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 2
description: The Doctor and Jamie investigate Waterfield's antiques shop, where they are knocked unconscious and transported back to the 19th century.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 3
description: As part of the Daleks' experiment, the Doctor manipulates Jamie into attempting to rescue Victoria.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 4
description: Jamie and Kemel team up to try and find Victoria, while the Doctor and the Daleks continue to monitor their progress.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 5
description: With the experiment at an end, the Doctor begins to suspect the key to rescuing Jamie, Victoria and Kemel from the Daleks lies with Terrall.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 6
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Waterfield follow the Daleks to Skaro, where they discover an unforeseen consequence to their experiment.

title: The Evil of the Daleks: Episode 7
description: The Daleks are poised to spread the Dalek Factor throughout the history of Earth and begin by implanting the Doctor.

title: The Tomb of the Cybermen: Episode 1
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Victoria arrive on Telos, where an archaeological group are exploring the Tomb of the Cybermen. But are the Cybermen as dormant as they believe?

title: The Tomb of the Cybermen: Episode 2
description: The archaeologists learn they are stranded on Telos and Klieg suggests they use the opportunity to explore the Cybermen's tombs.

title: The Tomb of the Cybermen: Episode 3
description: The Cybermen have been revived and plan to convert the archeologists into their own kind, prompting Hopper to attempt a rescue.

title: The Tomb of the Cybermen: Episode 4
description: Klieg attempts to do a deal with the Cybercontroller while the Doctor tries to find a way to refreeze the Cybermen permanently.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 1
description: When the TARDIS materialises in the Himalayas, the Doctor decides to pay a return visit to the nearby Det-Sen monastery only to be accused of murder.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 2
description: Jamie and Victoria make their way to the monastery shortly before it is attacked by the Yeti.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 3
description: While the Doctor and Jamie return to the TARDIS for equipment, the control sphere Jamie brought to the monastery is reactivated.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 4
description: The Yeti escapes from the monastery and Victoria and Thonmi are accused of assisting it, while the Doctor and Jamie endure a perilous journey back across the mountains.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 5
description: Victoria falls under the mental influence of Padmasambhva as the Yeti attack in order to drive the monks from the area.

title: The Abominable Snowmen: Episode 6
description: With the Great Intelligence on the verge of becoming corporeal, the Doctor challenges Padmasambhva to a mental battle in order to defeat it.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 1
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Victoria are brought to a base which is attempting to halt the flow of the Second Ice Age.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 2
description: Varga revives and takes Victoria hostage as he works to revive his crew while the Doctor and Jamie find Penley stealing medical supplies.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 3
description: Jamie and Arden venture out to rescue Victoria only to find the rest of the Ice Warriors are now active.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 4
description: The Doctor leaves the base to try and find Jamie and Victoria while Storr tries to do a deal with the Ice Warriors.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 5
description: The Doctor and Victoria are both held prisoner by the Ice Warriors as Varga decides to take over Brittanicus.

title: The Ice Warriors: Episode 6
description: The Doctor and Victoria attempt to force the Ice Warriors to surrender control of the ioniser before the ice flow destroys them.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 1
description: After the Doctor is attacked by a group of mysterious gunmen, he discovers he is the physical double of the famous scientist Salamander.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 2
description: Jamie and Victoria agree to accompany Astrid to Hungary to observe Salamander's activities.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 3
description: Jamie and Victoria join Astrid into attempting to rescue Denes but Salamander becomes suspicious of them.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 4
description: Fariah brings the Doctor and Kent evidence of Salamander's activities but then they come under attack from Benik.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 5
description: The Doctor persuades Bruce to help him infiltrate Salamander's research centre while Salamander takes drastic action to prevent Swann finding out the truth.

title: The Enemy of the World: Episode 6
description: The Doctor discovers the true link between Salamander and Kent while Astrid tries to convince the shelter inhabitants they have been lied to.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS becomes trapped in space before ending up in an underground station of a mysteriously deserted London.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 2
description: Jamie and Victoria are reunited with Travers before Jamie joins the soldiers in attempting to find out what has happened to the Doctor.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 3
description: The Doctor and Victoria are taken back to the Goodge Street base by Colonel Lethbridge-Stewart where the Doctor becomes convinced there is a traitor in their midst.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 4
description: With Travers having been captured by the Yeti, the Doctor attempts to find a way to gain control of the robots while Lethbridge-Stewart tries to recover the TARDIS.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 5
description: Victoria and Travers are held prisoner by the Great Intelligence, who is planning to drain the Doctor's mind.

title: The Web of Fear: Episode 6
description: The Doctor and his friends are held prisoner by the Intelligence and their only hope lies with Jamie, Arnold and a reprogrammed Yeti.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 1
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Victoria are taken prisoner by the staff of a gas refinery, who have lost contact with their drilling rigs and experienced mysterious drops in pressure.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 2
description: Harris asks for the Doctor's help with Maggie with Van Lutyens and the Chief Engineer attempt to find out what is blocking the impeller.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 3
description: While the Doctor begins his investigation into the weed creatures, Robson is attacked by one at the refinery.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 4
description: Van Lutyens' investigation of the base of the impeller places the Doctor and Jamie in danger from the Weed Creature.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 5
description: With the Weed Creature poised to burst out of the pipeline and attack the base, an encounter with Oak and Quill gives the Doctor a vital clue about its weakness.

title: Fury from the Deep: Episode 6
description: The Doctor and Jamie rescue Victoria from Robson and realise they can destroy the Weed Creature with sound waves.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 1
description: The Doctor and Jamie arrive on a mysterious spacecraft whose only occupant is a dangerous Servo Robot.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 2
description: The Doctor and Jamie are brought aboard the Wheel where Jamie is horrified to learn the crew plan to destroy the Silver Carrier with the TARDIS on board.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 3
description: Jamie sabotages the Wheel's x-ray laser, unknowingly giving the Cybermen an opportunity to reach the Wheel.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 4
description: The Cybermen instruct their human slaves to smuggle them onto the Wheel while the Doctor attempts to convince Bennett of the threat they pose.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 5
description: The Cybermen gain control of more members of the Wheel crew and the Doctor realises the only way to stop them is for Jamie and Zoe to make a dangerous space walk.

title: The Wheel in Space: Episode 6
description: Jamie and Zoe attempt to recover the time vector generator while the Cybermen realise the Doctor is on the Wheel and make him their prime target.

title: The Dominators: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS arrives on the planet Dulkis where the Doctor, Zoe and Jamie decide to have a quiet holiday. Only to find the Evil Dominators and their robotic slaves, The Quarks have arrived on a radioactive island, where they plan to detonate a bomb in the planet's core, which will turn the entire planet as source of radioactive fuel for their invasion fleet.

title: The Dominators: Episode 2
description: The Doctor and Jamie are captured by the Dominators, who subject them to an intelligence test, while Zoe and Cully attempt to convince the Dulcian council of the threat.

title: The Dominators: Episode 3
description: Zoe and Cully are captured by the Dominators and put to work alongside the survey team while the Doctor and Jamie decide to return to the island to help.

title: The Dominators: Episode 4
description: The Doctor and Zoe are interrogated by Rago, who is planning to present his terms to the Dulcian council, while Jamie and Cully try to find a way to strike back against the Quarks.

title: The Dominators: Episode 5
description: Jamie and Cully manage to rescue the Doctor's party and together they try to find a way to stop the Dominators before they destroy the entire planet.

title: The Mind Robber: Episode 1
description: The TARDIS arrives in a white void, when the TARDIS makes a emergency take-off to escape the volcanic eruption on Dulkis. Where the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe find themselves in the Land of Fiction, where fictional characters from the imagination come to life and The Master, the mysterious ruler of The Land of Fiction chooses the Doctor to take his place.

roles.char: The Master of the Land of Fiction

title: The Mind Robber: Episode 2
description: With the TARDIS destroyed, the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe find themselves in a strange forest patrolled by mysterious soldiers.

roles.char: The Master of the Land of Fiction

title: The Mind Robber: Episode 3
description: The Doctor realises that the travelers are trapped in a world where fiction is real and where creatures are a threat if people believe in them.

roles.char: The Master of the Land of Fiction

title: The Mind Robber: Episode 4
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe reach the citadel at the centre of the land, where they finally encounter the Master of the Land of Fiction.

roles.char: The Master of the Land of Fiction

title: The Mind Robber: Episode 5
description: With Jamie and Zoe having been turned into fiction, the Doctor must find a way to save them without suffering the same fate or becoming part of the Master Brain.

roles.char: The Master of the Land of Fiction

title: The Invasion: Episode 1
description: The Doctor and the newly formed UNIT must stop a Cybermen Invasion and a Sinister Industrialist in league with them

title: The Invasion: Episode 2
description: The Doctor and Jamie are taken prisoner by their mysterious observers and have a reunion with an old friend while Zoe and Isobel carry out their own investigation of IE.

title: The Invasion: Episode 3
description: The Doctor and Jamie return to the IE factory in search of Zoe and Isobel, where they meet with Professor Watkins and fall foul of Vaughn.

title: The Invasion: Episode 4
description: The Doctor and Jamie enlist the help of UNIT to rescue Zoe and Isobel before trying to find out what Vaughn is really up to.

title: The Invasion: Episode 5
description: The Doctor and Jamie tell the Brigadier about the Cybermen but with Rutledge under Vaughn's control he is powerless to act.

title: The Invasion: Episode 6
description: Captain Turner manages to rescue Jamie and the others, while the Doctor begins working on a way to protect everyone from the Cybermen's hypno-sound signal.

title: The Invasion: Episode 7
description: With the entire world unconscious apart from the Doctor and his friends, the Cybermen are poised to invade and only Zoe, the Brigadier and a missile crew can stop them.

title: The Invasion: Episode 8
description: The Cybermen are here to take over the world, and for the first time, UNIT are here to deal with the threats of a global invasion of a very alien and robotic kind. With locations shots of a nineteen sixties London to enhance realism and a new and fresh, contemporary look for the Cybermen, these episodes were considered a landmark and turning point in the Doctor Who franchise that has a sinister industrialist working in league with the dreaded Cybermen. It is now up to the Doctor and the United Nations Intelligence Taskforce to thwart their plans in eight new exciting and action filled chapters'.

title: The Krotons: Episode One
description: The TARDIS lands on a nameless desolate planet where The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe learn the native Gonds are ruled by the mysterious and unseen Krotons, where The Krotons chooses their top students to join The Krotons in their machine as their companions. But The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe discover The Krotons are crystalline alien beings and are turning The Gonds mental power into energy and are feeding off it.

title: The Krotons: Episode Two
description: Zoe is selected as a companion for the Krotons and the Doctor insists on joining her.

title: The Krotons: Episode Three
description: Jamie is held prisoner by the Krotons who intend to recapture the Doctor and Zoe for their mental energy.

title: The Krotons: Episode Four
description: Selris succeeds in drawing the Krotons out of the Dynatrope but Eelek agrees to hand the Doctor and Zoe over to them in return for their leaving the planet.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode One
description: 21st century Earth is entirely dependent on the T-Mat transport system but the control centre on the moon has stopped functioning. Meanwhile, the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe meet the one man who can solve the crisis.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode Two
description: Eldred agrees to supply a rocket for travel to the moon and the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe volunteer to crew it.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode Three
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe make it to the moon and join forces with Phipps but the Ice Warriors have gained control of T-mat.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode Four
description: The Ice Warriors' seed pods beginning materialising all over the globe while Slaar decides to kill the Doctor by T-matting him into space.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode Five
description: The Doctor and his allies manage to return to Earth via T-mat only to find the Ice Warrior has attacked the weather control station.

title: The Seeds of Death: Episode Six
description: The Doctor manages to create a rain storm to destroy the Martian fungus before trying to find a way to stop the Ice Warriors' invasion fleet.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 1
description: Space beacons are being destroyed by pirates, who are salvaging the argonite metal. When the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe arrive on one of the beacons, they are mistaken for pirates.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 2
description: With the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe trapped on a beacon segment, Hermack becomes suspicious of the unruly prospector Milo Clancey.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 3
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe flee from the Space Corps with Clancey, who decides to seek refuge on Ta.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 4
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe are held prisoner by the space pirates while Caven comes up with a plan to throw suspicion onto Clancey.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 5
description: Madeleine is revealed to be working with Caven, who comes up with a way to kill the Doctor and his friends whilst framing them for the piracy.

title: The Space Pirates: Episode 6
description: With Clancey and Issigri trapped aboard the LIZ, the Doctor, Jamie and Zoe try to convince Madeleine to help them before Caven destroys Ta.

title: The War Games: Episode One
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Zoe realise they have arrived in the trenches of the First World War, where the sinister General Smythe accuses them of espionage.

title: The War Games: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and Zoe manage to escape from Ransom and attempt to rescue Jamie from the military prison.

title: The War Games: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and his friends realise the area is divided into different time zones and decide to return to the chteau to obtain a map from Smythe.

title: The War Games: Episode Four
description: The Doctor and Zoe are transported to the control centre of the war games while Jamie and Lady Jennifer fall foul of American Revolution soldiers.

title: The War Games: Episode Five
description: The Doctor attempts to rescue Zoe and Carstairs while Jamie and Lady Jennifer try to convince the resistance of the true nature of Von Weich and the others.

title: The War Games: Episode Six
description: The scientist examines the captured resistance fighters and realises Jamie is a new arrival on the planet while the Doctor, Zoe and Carstairs try to rescue their friends.

title: The War Games: Episode Seven
description: The Doctor, Jamie and Carstairs manage to return to the 1917 zone only to be captured by Smythe, who orders the Doctor executed.

title: The War Games: Episode Eight
description: The Doctor and the processing machine have been taken by the Aliens but the resistance are making plans to attack the control centre.

title: The War Games: Episode Nine
description: To prove his loyalty to the Aliens, the Doctor is ordered to reprocess his friends while the Security Chief finally uncovers evidence of the War Chief's treachery.

title: The War Games: Episode Ten
description: The TARDIS is drawn to the planet of the Time Lords where both the Doctor and the War Lord are placed on trial.

title: Spearhead from Space: Episode 1
description: As the newly-regenerated Doctor arrives on Earth, so does the Nestene too.

title: Spearhead from Space: Episode 2
description: UNIT's attempts to locate the meteorites are hampered by the mysterious plastic Autons, being constructed by Channing at a nearby factory, while the Doctor makes another attempt to escape from the hospital.

title: Spearhead from Space: Episode 3
description: Ransome manages to escape from the plastics factory and alert UNIT, prompting the Doctor and the Brigadier to start an investigation.

title: Spearhead from Space: Episode 4
description: With UNIT's investigation being blocked by the Replica of Scobie, the Doctor and Liz visit Madame Tussaud's to try and find out more as Channing prepares to activate the Autons.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 1
description: The Doctor and Liz are summoned to the Wenley Moor Research Centre by the Brigadier, after several staff members suffer nervous breakdowns.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 2
description: The Doctor attempts to convince people there are monsters in the caves, prompting Major Baker to start shooting at a reptile man.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 3
description: The Silurians contact Quinn for help in retrieving their fellow while the Doctor and the Brigadier organise a search of the moors.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 4
description: With Quinn dead, the Brigadier decides to take an armed party into the caves, prompting the Doctor to contact the Silurians himself.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 5
description: Worried about the Old Silurian's growing friendship with the Doctor, the Young Silurian has the scientist infect Baker with a virus and then release him.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 6
description: While the Doctor and Liz try to find a cure to the virus spread by Baker, the Young Silurian kills the Old Silurian and takes control of his people.

title: Doctor Who and the Silurians: Episode 7
description: While Liz distributes the cure to the virus, the Doctor discovers the Silurians now plan to wipe out humanity by destroying the Van Allen Belt.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 1
description: While the Brigadier investigates a loss of contact with Mars Probe 7, the Doctor realises signals coming from the probe are of extra-terrestrial origin.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 2
description: UNIT retrieve the returned Recovery 7 but then Carrington hijacks it while the Doctor and Liz try to decode the signal he sent.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 3
description: Carrington is holding the astronauts at a secret location but when he takes the Doctor, Liz and the Brigadier there they find they have been kidnapped.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 4
description: Liz has been captured by Reegan's men and the Doctor begins to suspect Taltalian is more involved than he appeared.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 5
description: The Doctor decides to take Recovery 7 back into space to search for the missing astronauts but Reegan sabotages the launch.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 6
description: The Doctor speaks with the alien captain and learns the astronauts sent to Earth were ambassadors.However, before he can alert the authorities he is kidnapped by Reegan.

title: The Ambassadors of Death: Episode 7
description: Carrington is planning to expose the aliens on live television and call for an interplanetary war and the Brigadier must rescue the Doctor and Liz in time to stop him.

title: Inferno: Episode 1
description: A dangerous experiment throws the Doctor into a doomed dimension

title: Inferno: Episode 2
description: The Doctor begins to suspect that penetrating the earth's crust will create more Primords but Stahlman sabotages the computer to stop him proving it.

title: Inferno: Episode 3
description: The Doctor finds himself in a parallel universe where Britain is a dictatorship and the Inferno Project is a slave labour camp policed by his friends' counterparts.

title: Inferno: Episode 4
description: The Doctor attempts to convince the alternate Inferno staff that penetrating the earth's crust will cause a disaster but instead is imprisoned with an infected Bromley.

title: Inferno: Episode 5
description: The earth's crust has been penetrated and, while the Doctor and Greg try to contain the disaster, the Doctor begins to realise the planet has passed the point of no return.

title: Inferno: Episode 6
description: With the parallel earth doomed, the Doctor asks his friends' counterparts to help him return to his own world but the Brigade Leader only sees the TARDIS as a means of escape.

title: Inferno: Episode 7
description: The Doctor is back in his own universe and must stop Stahlman before his earth suffers the same fate as the parallel one.

title: Terror of the Autons: Episode One
description: When a Nestene Energy Unit is stolen and a radio telescope sabotaged, the Doctor is contacted by a Time Lord who tells him his old rival the Master is responsible.

title: Terror of the Autons: Episode Two
description: Attempting to find out where Jo encountered the Master, the Doctor heads to the circus where he falls foul of Rossini.

title: Terror of the Autons: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and the Brigadier head to Farrel's factory but the Master and the Autons have already left and are distributing plastic daffodils around the country.

title: Terror of the Autons: Episode Four
description: The Doctor discovers the plastic daffodils are designed to fire a spray that asphyxiates people, causing havoc prior to the Nestene's arrival, but before he can alert anyone he and Jo are captured by the Master.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode One
description: The Doctor and Jo head to Stangmoor Prison to investigate the Keller Machine, which drains the evil impulses from prisoners' minds, while UNIT are handling security at the first world peace conference.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode Two
description: The Doctor is recalled by UNIT to help investigate Cheng-Tiek's murder but is unaware that Chin-Lee is under the control of the Master.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode Three
description: Realising Chin-Lee has been using the power of the Keller Machine to carry out assassinations, the Doctor heads back to Stangmoor, only to find the Master has teamed up with Mailer to stage another riot.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode Four
description: With the Doctor and Jo being held prisoner, the Master convinces Mailer to help him steal the Thunderbolt.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode Five
description: The Doctor is forced to help the Master control the mind parasite while Yates finds out where the Thunderbolt has been taken only to be captured by the Master's men.

title: The Mind of Evil: Episode Six
description: The Brigadier has recaptured Stangmoor but the Master still has control of the Thunderbolt and the Doctor must find a way to stop him and destroy the Keller Machine.

title: The Claws of Axos: Episode One
description: When a mysterious object lands near the Nuton power complex, UNIT investigate and encounter the Axons, a group of aliens who offer the mineral axonite, which can duplicate matter, as a gift.

title: The Claws of Axos: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and Winser begin to analyse axonite while Chinn plots to secure its use exclusively for Britain.

title: The Claws of Axos: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and Jo are being held prisoner by Axos while Chinn is forced to organise the worldwide distribution of axonite and the Master returns to the power complex to try and steal the TARDIS.

title: The Claws of Axos: Episode Four
description: The Doctor and Jo escape from Axos but then the Doctor offers the Master a deal:if he helps him repair the TARDIS, they can flee Earth together.

title: Colony in Space: Episode One
description: The Time Lords takes control of the TARDIS and the Doctor and Jo arrive on a Earth Colony in the 25th Century, where a ruthless mining company are using a dinosaur-like creature to force the colonists to leave the planet. Where the Doctor and Jo learn that The Master is on the planet and is in search of a doomsday weapon that is hidden somewhere on the planet.

title: Colony in Space: Episode Two
description: The Doctor discovers an Interplanetary Mining Corporation ship has landed on the planet in order to mine its duralinium, while Norton begins causing trouble at the colony.

title: Colony in Space: Episode Three
description: The Doctor makes it back to the colony and warns Ashe what Dent is up to but when Jo and Winton try to find proof they are captured.

title: Colony in Space: Episode Four
description: The Doctor descends into the Primitive city to try and find Jo while the colonists receive a visit from the Adjudicator.

title: Colony in Space: Episode Five
description: The Master offers to help the colonists in exchange for information on the Primitive city and forces the Doctor to act as a guide by taking Jo hostage.

title: Colony in Space: Episode Six
description: The Doctor and the Master are taken into the Primitive city, where the Master hopes to find the doomsday weapon, while Dent forces the colonists to leave the planet even though their ship is likely to explode.

title: The Dmons: Episode One
description: The Master raises the Devil. The Doctor becomes a wizard.

title: The Dmons: Episode Two
description: With the Doctor frozen by the energy release from the barrow, Jo calls Yates and Benton for help, but when the Brigadier tries to join them he finds the village surrounded by a heat barrier.

title: The Dmons: Episode Three
description: The Doctor explains to his friends that the Master is trying to gain the power of the last of the Daemons, a race who influenced Earth's development, while the Master brings the rest of the village under his control.

title: The Dmons: Episode Four
description: The Master orders Bert to set a trap for the Doctor at the village while a concussed Jo makes for the cavern.

title: The Dmons: Episode Five
description: The Master decides to sacrifice Jo to Azal and when the Doctor and his friends try to intervene they come under attack from Bok.

title: Day of the Daleks: Episode One
description: When someone tries to assassinate diplomat Sir Reginald Styles, UNIT investigate the possibility his attacker came from the future.

title: Day of the Daleks: Episode Two
description: Jo uses the guerrillas' time machine to travel to the 22nd century where the Controller tricks her into telling the Daleks where she's come from.

title: Day of the Daleks: Episode Three
description: The Doctor forces the guerrillas to take him to the 22nd century where he is soon captured by the Controller.

title: Day of the Daleks: Episode Four
description: The guerrillas infiltrate the Daleks' base to rescue the Doctor and Jo and ask them to return to their own time and alter history before the 20th century is plunged into a Third World War.

title: The Curse of Peladon: Episode One
description: The Doctor and Jo arrive on the medieval planet Peladon, where the Doctor is mistaken for the Earth Delegate of the Galactic Federation and Jo is mistaken for a princess. Where the Doctor uncovers a conspiracy, as he exposes the evil scheme of the high-priest Hepesh who bids to prevent King Peladon from joining the galactic Federation.

title: The Curse of Peladon: Episode Two
description: The Doctor is convinced the Ice Warriors are trying to sabotage the conference but his attempts to prove it see him accused of sacrilege.

title: The Curse of Peladon: Episode Three
description: The Doctor is sentenced to fight Grun to the death and his attempt to escape leads to an encounter with Aggedor.

title: The Curse of Peladon: Episode Four
description: Hepesh's plan has been exposed but he is still determined to prevent Peladon joining the Galactic Federation by leading a rebellion against the King.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode One
description: The Doctor and Jo visit the Master at his island prison where the Doctor becomes curious about a number of ships sinking in the area.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and Jo are trapped on the fort by a Sea Devil while the Master convinces Trenchard to help him steal some electronic components.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode Three
description: The Doctor is held prisoner by Trenchard while the Master attempts to contact the Sea Devils.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode Four
description: The Sea Devils attack the island prison and rescue the Master, prompting the Doctor to venture underwater to try and contact them.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode Five
description: The Doctor is taken to the Sea Devils' underwater colony where he tries to make peace with the creatures, only for the navy to attack the base.

title: The Sea Devils: Episode Six
description: The Sea Devils take over the naval base and the Doctor is forced to help the Master find a way to revive their colony.

title: The Mutants: Episode One
description: The Doctor and Jo arrive on the planet Solos, on a assignment by the Time Lords. Where the Doctor and Jo learn that the native Solonians are mutating into ant-like mutant creatures and they uncover a conspiracy, where the evil Marshal of the Earth Empire plots to rule Solos for himself and plans to convert Solos atmosphere, since the planet's atmosphere is poisonous, so the planet can be colonized by the humans and he plans to wipe out all the mutated Solonians, who are evolving into a advanced super race.

title: The Mutants: Episode Two
description: Ky transports himself and Jo down to Solos and the Marshal only agrees to help her if the Doctor assists Professor Jaeger in altering Solos' atmosphere.

title: The Mutants: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and Varan travel down to Solos to search for Jo and Ky but the Marshal orders his men to pursue them.

title: The Mutants: Episode Four
description: The Doctor and his friends are led to safety by Professor Sondergaard, who tries to help the Doctor translate the tablets.

title: The Mutants: Episode Five
description: The Marshal's premature use of Jaeger's experiment is threatening to destroy Solos' atmosphere and the Doctor returns to Skybase to try and correct the damage.

title: The Mutants: Episode Six
description: The Doctor is forced to help the Marshal cover up his actions with the Investigator but Jo and the others attempt to escape to expose him.

title: The Time Monster: Episode One
description: UNIT are invited to observe a demonstration of the new TOMTIT machine, unaware its creator, Professor Thascales, is actually the Master.

title: The Time Monster: Episode Two
description: The Doctor realises the Master is trying to harness the power of Kronos, last of the Chronovores, but is unaware Percival is harbouring him at the institute.

title: The Time Monster: Episode Three
description: The Master enlists the help of Krasis to control Kronos while Yates tries to bring the TARDIS to the institute only to come under attack from dangers from the past.

title: The Time Monster: Episode Four
description: The Master prepares to travel back to Atlantis but the Doctor links his TARDIS to the Master's to try and stop him.

title: The Time Monster: Episode Five
description: Both TARDISes reach Atlantis, where the Doctor befriends King Dalios while the Master enlists the help of Queen Galleia to try and obtain the crystal of Kronos.

title: The Time Monster: Episode Six
description: The Doctor enters the labyrinth to try and protect Jo from the minotaur but the Master has seized control of Atlantis and prepares to summon Kronos again.

title: The Three Doctors: Episode One
description: The 10th Anniversary Serial has three incarnations of the Doctor meeting up to face the evil Omega in a universe of antimatter.

title: The Three Doctors: Episode Two
description: The third Doctor and Jo find themselves on an artificial world inside the black hole while the second Doctor tries to find a way to control the organism.

title: The Three Doctors: Episode Three
description: The Time Lord Omega reveals himself to the third Doctor along with plans for vengeance against his own kind.

title: The Three Doctors: Episode Four
description: Omega reveals the purpose behind bringing the Doctor to his antimatter world, but the Doctor(s) discover a startling fact about Omega that he didn't know himself and eventually strike a bargain.

title: Carnival of Monsters: Episode One
description: The Doctor attempts to test his new dematerialisation circuit by taking Jo to Metebelis Three but instead the TARDIS arrives in the hold of a 1920s cargo ship.

title: Carnival of Monsters: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and Jo attempt to find a way out of the Scope but, when Vorg attempts to entertain the Minorans, the crew of the Bernice suddenly become a lot more dangerous.

title: Carnival of Monsters: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and Jo return to the Bernice to try and aid their escape but find themselves pursued by the Drashigs.

title: Carnival of Monsters: Episode Four
description: The Doctor escapes from the Scope and joins forces with Vorg to try and save its inhabitants but Kalik is still determined to use the Drashigs to start a rebellion.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode One
description: The Doctor and Jo discover The Master and the Ogrons are the masterminds behind the Galactic war between the Earth Federation and the Reptillian Draconian Empire and the Master has framed The Doctor and Jo as spies working for the Draconians. Only to discover The Master is also working with the Doctor's greatest enemies, The Daleks, who are also behind the galactic war.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and Jo are taken to Earth, where both humans and Draconians believe them to be a spy for the other side.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode Three
description: The Doctor is sentenced to life imprisonment at a lunar penal colony while Jo encounters an old enemy.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode Four
description: The Master rescues the Doctor from the lunar penal colony, aiming to take him and Jo to the Ogrons' planet, and the Doctor's attempt to escape leaves him stranded in space.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode Five
description: The Doctor, Jo and the Master are taken to Draconia, where the Doctor tries to convince the Draconians of the truth. But then the Ogrons attack.

title: Frontier in Space: Episode Six
description: The Doctor, Williams and the Draconian Prince head to the Ogrons' planet to find evidence of the Master's actions but the Master tricks Jo into leading them into a trap.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode One
description: The TARDIS lands on the jungle planet Spiridon, where the Doctor has fallen into a coma, where The Doctor has requested the Time Lords to pilot the TARDIS, so he and Jo can follow the Daleks to their base. Where Jo learns the Dalek's base has been located on Spiridon where the Daleks are attempting to discover the secrets of Invisibilty and create a bacterial virus in their goal of universal conquest. Where The Doctor, recovered from his coma and Jo are joined by a task-force of Thals and a native Spiridon named Wester, Where they not only set out to stop The Daleks evil plot, they also discover a army of 12,000 Daleks are in suspended animation and are waiting to be revived to begin their universal conquest and claim themselves as the supreme rulers of the galaxy.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode Two
description: The Doctor is captured by the Daleks, while Jo is rescued by a friendly Spridon named Wester.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and Codal escape from their cell and meet up with the Thal commandos who are trying to get into the Dalek base.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode Four
description: The Doctor and his friends escape from the Dalek base, prompting the Daleks to devise a plan to wipe them out.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode Five
description: The Doctor and his friends ambush two Daleks as part of their planet to get back into the city but the Daleks are on the verge of unleashing their virus.

title: Planet of the Daleks: Episode Six
description: The Doctor and his friends prepare to refreeze the Dalek army but the Dalek Supreme has arrived on the planet determined to destroy them all.

title: The Green Death: Episode One
description: While the Doctor plans a holiday to Metebelis Three, Jo and the Brigadier are intrigued by a mysterious death at a coal mine in Llanfairfach, which is being blamed on local company Global Chemicals.

title: The Green Death: Episode Two
description: The Doctor and the Brigadier attempt to rescue Jo and Bert from the mine but Global Chemicals prove distinctly uncooperative.

title: The Green Death: Episode Three
description: The Doctor and Jo manage to escape from the mine with a maggot egg but Stevens is determined to stop them analysing it.

title: The Green Death: Episode Four
description: The Brigadier calls in a full UNIT force to deal with the giant maggots while the Doctor infiltrates Global Chemicals to find out what is really going on.

title: The Green Death: Episode Five
description: The Doctor manages to escape from BOSS with help from Yates and discovers Cliff has been infected by a giant maggot.

title: The Green Death: Episode Six
description: The Doctor attempts to destroy the giant maggots and cure Cliff but the real threat is BOSS, who is poised to take over all the world's computers.

title: The Time Warrior: Part One
description: The Brigadier asks the Doctor to investigate the disappearance of several scientists, only for him to find they have been abducted back in time.

title: The Time Warrior: Part Two
description: The Doctor tracks the missing scientists to Irongron's castle, where Linx is using them to repair his spaceship and construct advanced weapons for Irongron.

title: The Time Warrior: Part Three
description: The Doctor escapes the castle with Sarah and Hal and must persuade Sir Edward to trust him before Irongron launches an attack on them.

title: The Time Warrior: Part Four
description: The Doctor attempts to return the scientists to their own time, before Linx tries to use his spaceship and destroys the entire castle.

title: Invasion: Part One
description: The Doctor and Sarah return to London in the present day only to find the city strangely deserted, while nearby UNIT are dealing with a series of monster appearances.

title: Invasion of the Dinosaurs: Part Two
description: The Doctor and Sarah returns to present-day Earth, where they find London has been evacuated, and Dinosaurs are on the loose and they are mistaken for looters. Assisting U.N.I.T in the emergency, The Doctor and Sarah discovers corrupt politician Sir Charles Grover MP, renegade scientists Butler and Professor Whitaker and military officer General Finch are using a time machine to bring the dinosaurs from the past to the present as part of they scheme to bring the human race back to a "Golden Age" before the world was polluted.

title: Invasion of the Dinosaurs: Part Three
description: Yates sabotages the Doctor's equipment to stop him finding the location of Whitaker's base but then the tyrannosaur escapes, placing Sarah in danger.

title: Invasion of the Dinosaurs: Part Four
description: Sarah attempts to find a way off the spaceship while the Doctor tries to track down the source of the time displacements.

title: Invasion of the Dinosaurs: Part Five
description: The Doctor has been framed as the monster maker by Finch and is on the run from the army, while Sarah attempts to alert UNIT to what Grover is up to.

title: Invasion of the Dinosaurs: Part Six
description: The Doctor is rescued from Finch by the Brigadier and Benton and tries to persuade them to stop Grover before millions of people are erased from history.

title: Death to the Daleks: Part One
description: As the TARDIS heads to the paradise planet Florana where the Doctor and Sarah go for a holiday, the TARDIS goes off-course and arrives on the barren planet Exxilon, where the TARDIS is loosing power. The Doctor and Sarah finds a group of humans and Daleks are searching for Parrinium, a mineral which is the only antidote to a space plague. Both parties encounter the native people and trouble ensues. In an attempt to find what caused the power-loss, the Doctor, chased by the Daleks, enter the Exxilon's lost city to be able to stop the power draining phenomenon.

title: Death to the Daleks: Part Two
description: The Doctor and the MSC crew join forces with the Daleks to mine the parrinium, only to come under attack from the Exxilons.

title: Death to the Daleks: Part Three
description: The Doctor and Sarah meet up with Bellal, who helps them escape from the Daleks and explains the origin of the City.

title: Death to the Daleks: Part Four
description: The Doctor and Bellal continue to penetrate the City's defences while Sarah and Jill try to stop the Daleks leaving with the parrinium.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part One
description: Returning to the medieval planet Peladon (50 years after "The Curse of Peladon") The Doctor and Sarah find King Peladon's daughter Queen Thalira has inherited the throne and the galactic Federation is at war with Galaxy Five and The Federation requires the mineral Trisilicate that will end the war. Only to discover the miners led by the mad rebel Ettis are rebelling and refusing to work, as the ghost of the loyal best Aggedor is frightening and killing off Miners, only to discover the ghost of Aggedor is a holographic projection and the culprits are a task-force of renegade Ice Warriors led by Commander Azaxyr and traitorous federation mining engineer Eckersley who have betrayed the Federation to Galaxy Five.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part Two
description: The Doctor is rescued by Gebek, prompting him to try and help the miners, but his advice results in Ettis launching another attack on the armoury.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part Three
description: The Doctor and Sarah pacify Aggedor and the Doctor encourages the Queen to make peace with the miners, but Ortron soon has him under arrest again.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part Four
description: The Ice Warriors take control of the planet and force the miners to return to work but Ettis takes the opportunity to try and destroy the citadel.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part Five
description: Sarah and Alpha Centauri decide to try and alert the Federation to what the Ice Warriors are up to but first they have to escape from the throne room.

title: The Monster of Peladon: Part Six
description: The Doctor turns the Aggedor spirit against the Ice Warriors to aid the Peladonians in their battle but Eckersley attacks him with the security system.

title: Planet of the Spiders: Part One
description: While the Doctor carries out an investigation into ESP, Mike Yates asks Sarah to look into some strange goings on at a meditation centre he's attending.

title: Planet of the Spiders: Part Two
description: Lupton forms an alliance with the spider to steal the Doctor's blue crystal, while Sarah and Mike attempt to alert people to what they've seen.

title: Planet of the Spiders: Part Three
description: The Doctor and Sarah head to the meditation centre to try and get the crystal back while Lupton prepares to return it to Metebelis Three.But all their plans are disrupted when it is stolen by Tommy.

title: Planet of the Spiders: Part Four
